ygData.subject: Re: [The EverQuest Tavern] Everquest Marriage Questions......
ygData.msgSnippet: Basically it means you get to have cyber in private /tell legally LOL Seriously though it means that you all will be pretty muh sticking like glue wherever you
ygData.messageBody:
Basically it means you get to have cyber in private /tell legally LOL

Seriously though it means that you all will be pretty muh sticking like glue
wherever you go and will always be there to help out should one of you all
get into a spot of trouble. Not to mention ya'll wil tend to share
rescources with each other more than you would with others etc.

My DE SK (when he was still an active char) got married to a Wood Elf Ranger
when we were both in our 30's and we had known each other in game since we
first grouped together at Orc Highway in Oasis. e wound up going to
different places together to hunt shared rescources and managed to get
things one needed from an area where another was KoS. heck we even wound
up talking to each other on the phone a lot . heeh talk about high LD bills
She in Michigan and me here in Florida. Unfortunatley when I wound up
having to take a sabbatical fomr EQ due to comp problems (i.e not being able
to get the cash up fast enough to get my comp to handle the Luclin
requirements) she wound up EQ Marrying someone else and I didnt find out
about it until 2 days after the fact after she had left the guild we were in
together.

But for the most part it is a nice little arrangement


----- Original Message -----
From: "Meleficent Ouverts" <meleficent22@...>


>
>
> hey there everyone, i am at lvl 23 now, and a guy in my guild who i have
fought with since lvl 10(and has helped me the whole way), has asked my
character to marry him. Okay, what do you get for a marriage? He is a dark
elf necro, and i am woodelf ranger. What to do??? How do you get married on
here anyways???? the marriage bug is flying through our guild and it has
seemed to have bitten me as well. Any ideas would be great!!!!!! Keep them
clean please!!! LOL Bahahhahaha.
> Melefante
